patpat.command.list.add.already: Player {0} is already on the list!
patpat.command.list.remove: Player {0} has been removed from the list
patpat.command.list.remove.already: Player {0} is already not on the list!

patpat.command.list.set.error: {0} is not a valid list mode!
patpat.command.no_permission: You don't have permission to execute this command!

patpat.command.list.add.description: Adds a player to the permission list
patpat.command.list.remove.description: Removes a player from the permission list
patpat.command.list.set.description: Sets the mode of the permission list
patpat.command.info.description: Prints information about the plugin version
patpat.command.ratelimit.set.increment.d: Sets the value by which tokens are incremented
patpat.command.ratelimit.set.interval.de: Sets the interval at which tokens are replenished
patpat.command.ratelimit.info.descriptio: Prints information about rate limit settings
